gov.lbl.glamm.client.presenter
Class AnnotatedMapPresenter

java.lang.Object
  gov.lbl.glamm.client.presenter.AnnotatedMapPresenter

public class AnnotatedMapPresenter
extends java.lang.Object

Presenter for annotated map data - handles all mouse events associated with the map including pan/zoom and clicking of elements. Also handles all styling of map elements resulting from selecting an organism, overlaying experimental data, and finding routes between compounds.

Author:
jtbates

Nested Class Summary
static interface AnnotatedMapPresenter.View

AnnotatedMapPresenter

public AnnotatedMapPresenter(GlammServiceAsync rpc,
                             AnnotatedMapPresenter.View view,

Constructor

Parameters:
rpc - The GLAMM RPC service.

eventBus - The event bus.
Method Detail

fitMapToWindow

public void fitMapToWindow()
Fits the map to the window's client width, preserving the aspect ratio of the SVG file from which this map is derived. Note that the map may be too tall for the window's height as a result.

getZoomNorm

public float getZoomNorm()
Gets the normalized zoom factor for this window. This value is in the range [0,1] where 0 maps to the minimum possible zoom factor, and 1 maps to the maximum.

Returns:
The normalized zoom factor.

loadMapDataFromDescriptor

public void loadMapDataFromDescriptor(AnnotatedMapDescriptor descriptor)
Given an annotated map descriptor, this sends a GET request to retrieve the SVG file and fires a AnnotatedMapDataLoadedEvent when the file is received.

Parameters:
descriptor - The descriptor.

setMapData

public void setMapData(AnnotatedMapData mapData)
Sets the map data presented. Binds events to the interactive elements of this map.

Parameters:
mapData - The map data.

setZoomNormAboutPoint

public void setZoomNormAboutPoint(float zoomNorm,
                                  int x,
                                  int y)
Zooms by a normalized factor about a point in client space.

Parameters:
zoomNorm - Normalized zoom factor in the range [0,1]
x - Client X.
y - Client Y.

translateNorm

public void translateNorm(float txNorm,
                          float tyNorm)
Translates the map to normalized coordinates.

Parameters:
txNorm - Normalized translation parameter in the range [0,1], mapping to [0,Width of SVG map]
tyNorm - Normalized translation parameter in the range [0,1], mapping to [0,Height of SVG map]

updateMapForOrganism

public void updateMapForOrganism(Organism organism)
Darkens the reactions for which no genes are specified in the target organism. If a compound has no reactions connected to it, it will also be darkened.

Parameters:
organism - The organism.

updateMapForRoute

public void updateMapForRoute(Compound cpdSrc,
                              Compound cpdDst,
                              Pathway route)
Displays route information on the map.

Parameters:
cpdSrc - The source compound.
cpdDst - The destination compound.
route - The route.

updateMapForRouteStep

public void updateMapForRouteStep(Reaction reaction)
Centers a map around a specific reaction in a route.

Parameters:
reaction - The reaction.

updateMapForSample

public void updateMapForSample(Sample sample)
Paints *omics data onto the map. The target of the omics data is specified by the target type of the sample. Currently, data may be painted onto reactions, compounds, and genes (which map to reactions.)

Parameters:
sample - The sample.

updateMapForSearchTarget

public void updateMapForSearchTarget(java.util.Set<HasType> targets)
Centers map around a set of targets. Paints the targets a contrasting color to make them more visible.

Parameters:
targets - The set of targets.
